---
title: automatic dark image or div
format: html
brand:
  color:
    background:
      light: "#fff"
      dark: "#000"
    foreground:
      light: "#000"
      dark: "#fff"
filters:
  - add-dark-image.lua
---


### no caption, no cross-ref

![](elephant.png){.dark-image}

### caption, no cross-ref

![drawing of elephant](elephant.png){.dark-div}

### no caption, cross-ref

![](elephant.png){#fig-elephant .dark-image}

### caption and cross-ref

![drawing of elephant](elephant.png){#fig-elephant .dark-image}
